languages.text: Хейнрикс ван Калокс, бывший дознаватель Ордо Ксенос, занял место Лорд-инквизитора после смерти своего наставника. Получив розетту Инквизитора и приняв долг обороны сектора от врагов Человечества, ван Калокс стал новым комендантом Простора Коронус.

Heinrix van Calox, the former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, took the mantle of the Lord Inquisitor after his mentor's death. Receiving both the Inquisitor's rosette and the duty of defending the sector from the enemies of Humanity, van Calox became the new Warden of the Koronus Expanse.
languages.original_text: Хейнрикс ван Калокс, бывший дознаватель Ордо Ксенос, занял место Лорд-инквизитора после смерти своего наставника. Получив розетту Инквизитора и приняв долг обороны сектора от врагов Человечества, ван Калокс стал новым комендантом Простора Коронус.

traits.locale_text: Heinrix van Calox, the former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, took the mantle of the Lord Inquisitor after the death of his mentor. Receiving both the Inquisitor's rosette and the duty to defend the sector from the enemies of Humanity, van Calox became a new warden of the Koronus Expanse.

Heinrix van Calox, the former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, took the mantle of the Lord Inquisitor after the death of his mentor. Receiving both the Inquisitor's rosette and the duty to defend the sector from the enemies of Humanity, van Calox became a new warden of the Koronus Expanse.

Heinrix van Calox, the former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, took the mantle of the Lord Inquisitor after his mentor's death. Receiving both the Inquisitor's rosette and the duty to defend the sector from the enemies of Humanity, van Calox became a new warden of the Expanse.

Heinrix van Calox, the former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, took the mantle of the Lord Inquisitor after his mentor's death. Receiving both the Inquisitor's rosette and the duty to defend the sector from the enemies of Humanity, van Calox became a new warden of the Expanse.

Heinrix van Calox, the former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, took the mantle of the Lord Inquisitor after his mentor's death. Receiving both the Inquisitor's rosette and the duty of defending the sector from the enemies of Humanity, van Calox became the new Warden of the Koronus Expanse.

Heinrix van Calox, the former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, took the mantle of the Lord Inquisitor after his mentor's death. Receiving both the Inquisitor's rosette and the duty of defending the sector from the enemies of Humanity, van Calox became the new Warden of the Koronus Expanse.

languages.text: 海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯，异形审判庭的前任审讯官，在他的导师去世后接过了大审判官的衣钵。在得到了审判官玫瑰结的同时，冯·卡洛克斯也肩负起了保卫扩区免受人类之敌侵害的责任，成为了科罗努斯扩区的新任守护者。
languages.original_text: Heinrix van Calox, the former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, took the mantle of the Lord Inquisitor after his mentor's death. Receiving both the Inquisitor's rosette and the duty of defending the sector from the enemies of Humanity, van Calox became the new Warden of the Koronus Expanse.

traits.locale_text: 海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯，异形审判庭的前任审讯官，在他的导师去世后接过了审判长的衣钵。在得到了审判官玫瑰结的同时，冯·卡罗克斯也肩负起了保卫扩区免受人类之敌侵害的责任，成为了科罗努斯扩区的新任守护者。

languages.text: Heinrix van Calox, der ehemalige Interrogator des Ordo Xenos, übernahm nach dem Tod seines Mentors das Amt des Großinquisitors. Van Calox empfing sowohl die Rosette des Inquisitors als auch die Pflicht, den Sektor vor den Feinden der Menschheit zu verteidigen. Er wurde zum neuen Hüter der Koronus-Ausdehnung.
languages.original_text: Heinrix van Calox, the former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, took the mantle of the Lord Inquisitor after his mentor's death. Receiving both the Inquisitor's rosette and the duty of defending the sector from the enemies of Humanity, van Calox became the new Warden of the Koronus Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Heinrix van Calox, der ehemalige Interrogator des Ordo Xenos, übernahm nach dem Tod seines Mentors das Amt des Großinquisitors. Van Calox empfing sowohl die Rosette des Inquisitors als auch die Pflicht, den Sektor vor den Feinden der Menschheit zu verteidigen. Er wurde zum neuen Hüter der Ausdehnung.

languages.text: Heinrix van Calox, ancien interrogateur de l'Ordo Xénos, endossa le rôle de seigneur inquisiteur après la mort de son mentor. Arborant la rosette d'inquisiteur et chargé de défendre le secteur contre les ennemis de l'humanité, il devint le nouveau gardien des Étendues de Koronus.
languages.original_text: Heinrix van Calox, the former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, took the mantle of the Lord Inquisitor after his mentor's death. Receiving both the Inquisitor's rosette and the duty of defending the sector from the enemies of Humanity, van Calox became the new Warden of the Koronus Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Heinrix van Calox, ancien interrogateur de l'Ordo Xénos, endossa le rôle de seigneur inquisiteur après la mort de son mentor. Arborant la rosette d'inquisiteur et chargé de défendre le secteur contre les ennemis de l'humanité, il devint le nouveau gardien des Étendues.

languages.text: Heinrix van Calox, antiguo interrogador del Ordo Xenos, heredó el manto del Lord Inquisidor de su mentor caído. Con la roseta del Inquisidor y el deber de defender el sector de los enemigos de la Humanidad, van Calox se convirtió en el nuevo guardián de la Extensión de Koronus.
languages.original_text: Heinrix van Calox, the former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, took the mantle of the Lord Inquisitor after his mentor's death. Receiving both the Inquisitor's rosette and the duty of defending the sector from the enemies of Humanity, van Calox became the new Warden of the Koronus Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Heinrix van Calox, antiguo interrogador del Ordo Xenos, heredó el manto del Lord Inquisidor de su mentor caído. Con la roseta del Inquisidor y el deber de defender el sector de los enemigos de la Humanidad, van Calox se convirtió en el nuevo guardián de la Extensión.

languages.text: 純血の団のインテロゲイターだったハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスは、指導者の死を受けてロード・インクィジターの任を奉じた。異端審問官のロゼットと、人類の敵から宙域を守る務めのどちらも一手に引き受けたヴァン・カロックスは、コロヌス・エクスパンスの新たなワーデンとなった。
languages.original_text: Heinrix van Calox, the former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, took the mantle of the Lord Inquisitor after his mentor's death. Receiving both the Inquisitor's rosette and the duty of defending the sector from the enemies of Humanity, van Calox became the new Warden of the Koronus Expanse.

traits.locale_text: 純血の団のインテロゲイターだったハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスは、指導者の死を受けてロード・インクィジターの任を奉じた。異端審問官のロゼットと、人類の敵から宙域を守る務めのどちらも一手に引き受けたヴァン・カロックスは、コロヌス・エクスパンスの新たなワーデンとなった。

languages.text: Eski Zeno Nizamı Sorgucusu Heinrix van Calox, yönderinin vefatının ardından Lord Engizisyoncu yapıldı. Engizisyoncu'nun rozetini takıp sektörü İnsanlığın düşmanlarına karşı savunma vazifesini üstlenen van Calox, yeni Koronus Enginliği Dizdarı oldu.
languages.original_text: Heinrix van Calox, the former Interrogator of the Ordo Xenos, took the mantle of the Lord Inquisitor after his mentor's death. Receiving both the Inquisitor's rosette and the duty of defending the sector from the enemies of Humanity, van Calox became the new Warden of the Koronus Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Zeno Nizamı eski Sorgucu'su Heinrix Van Calox, yönderinin ölümünün ardından Lord Engizisyoncu görevine getirildi. Engizisyoncu'nun hem rozetini hem de sektörü İnsanlığın düşmanlarına karşı savunma vazifesini üstlenen van Calox, Koronus Enginliği'nin yeni Dizdar'ı hâline geldi.
